resources.string:
By: paizhangpi, Victor Jiao, 2019, 2020
Official Site: paizhang.info/MacIndex
Dedicated to education and internal use.
Sounds and photos by Apple.
Check out the official website for updates, comments, and other information.
Tap on the image to play startup and death sound.
Tap on the image to play startup sound.
Tap below to access more specifications…

MacIndex will not lunch specifications page in the future. Instead, it will redirect you to the specific EveryMac page of the model directly.\nMacIndex will ask you for specific configuration if the model has more than one configurations.\nHowever, if you are trying \"I\'m Feeling Lucky\", MacIndex will redirect you to a random EveryMac page directly without asking.
By default, MacIndex will play startup and death sound alternatively. However, if you would not prefer to hear death sound, you can turn it off.
By default, you can use left and right swipes to navigate between models. However, if you don\'t like this function, you can turn it off as well.
You may also enable old-fashioned navigate buttons with or without gestures.
Various early Macintosh computers with all-in-one design including the Original, XL, Plus, SE, (Color) Classic, and TV.
68020/68030-based Macintosh computers with expandable design and designed for high performance demands.
68020/68030/68040-based Macintosh \"low-cost\" computers designed for education market.
68040-based Macintosh \"center level\" computers designed for business market.
68040-based Macintosh computers designed for high performance demands and replaced Macintosh II.
68k/PowerPC-based Macintosh computers repacked consisting models with special bundles.
PowerPC 60x-based Macintosh computers designed for various demands.
PowerPC G3/G4/G5-based Macintosh computers with expandable design and designed for high performance demands.
PowerPC G3/G4/G5-based Macintosh computers with all-in-one design and designed for home and multimedia use.
PowerPC G4-based Macintosh computers with all-in-one design and designed for education market.
PowerPC G4-based Macintosh computers with extremely compact design.
68k/PowerPC-based Macintosh laptops designed for various demands.
PowerPC G3/G4-based Macintosh laptops designed for high performance demands.
PowerPC G3/G4-based Macintosh laptops designed for home and multimedia use.
More than one configurations are found for this model. Please make a selection then confirm.
Due to sale region or special purpose, this model is not available in EveryMac
